properties.entry: SELECT re.RES_NO , h.HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_NAME , USER_NO , R.RO_NO , DATE_IN , DATE_OUT , RES_DATE , RES_STATUS , REQ , REASON_CANCEL , PAY_METHOD , PAY , PAY_DATE , RES_PEOPLE , RES_ROOM_COUNT , RES_NAME , RES_PHONE , RES_EMAIL , H.IMG_PATH , RO_NAME , RO_PRICE , OP_NAME FROM TB_RES_INFO RE JOIN TB_HOTEL H ON (RE.HOTEL_NO = H.HOTEL_NO) JOIN TB_ROOM R ON (RE.RO_NO = R.RO_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY DATE_IN ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT re.RES_NO , h.HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_NAME , USER_NO , R.RO_NO , DATE_IN , DATE_OUT , RES_DATE , RES_STATUS , REQ , REASON_CANCEL , PAY_METHOD , PAY , PAY_DATE , RES_PEOPLE , RES_ROOM_COUNT , RES_NAME , RES_PHONE , RES_EMAIL , H.IMG_PATH , RO_NAME , RO_PRICE , OP_NAME FROM TB_RES_INFO RE JOIN TB_HOTEL H ON (RE.HOTEL_NO = H.HOTEL_NO) JOIN TB_ROOM R ON (RE.RO_NO = R.RO_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY DATE_IN ASC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT RES_NO , HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_NAME , USER_NO , R.RO_NO , DATE_IN , DATE_OUT , RES_DATE , RES_STATUS , REQ , REASON_CANCEL , PAY_METHOD , PAY , PAY_DATE , RES_PEOPLE , RES_ROOM_COUNT , RES_NAME , RES_PHONE , RES_EMAIL , H.IMG_PATH , RO_NAME , OP_NAME FROM TB_RES_INFO RI JOIN TB_HOTEL H USING (HOTEL_NO) JOIN TB_ROOM R USING (HOTEL_NO) WHERE RES_NO = ?
SELECT WISH_NO , USER_NO , HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_NAME , REG_DATE , IMG_PATH FROM TB_WISH JOIN TB_HOTEL USING (HOTEL_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY WISH_NO ASC

SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , USER_ENG_NAME , USER_PWD , BIRTH_DATE , EMAIL , PHONE , ZIPCODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ETC , REGIST_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_USER SET USER_NAME = ? , USER_PWD = ? , PHONE = ? , EMAIL = ? , ZIPCODE = ? , ADDRESS = ? , ADDRESS_DETAIL = ? , ETC = ? WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE TB_USER SET STATUS = 'N' , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ?

UPDATE TB_RES_INFO SET DATE_IN = ? , DATE_OUT = ? , RES_PEOPLE = ? , RES_ROOM_COUNT = ? , RO_NO = ? , OP_NAME = ? , RES_NAME = ? , RES_PHONE = ? , RES_EMAIL = ? , PAY = ? , PAY_METHOD = ? , RES_STATUS = '예약대기' WHERE RES_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_RES_INFO SET RES_STATUS = '예약취소' WHERE RES_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_RES_INFO WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_WISH WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT REV_NO , TB_RES_INFO.RES_NO , TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO , REV_TITLE , DATE_IN , DATE_OUT , RES_PEOPLE , IMG_PATH , HOTEL_NAME
FROM TB_RES_INFO JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = TB_RES_INFO.HOTEL_NO LEFT JOIN TB_REVIEW ON TB_RES_INFO.RES_NO = TB_REVIEW.RES_NO WHERE TB_RES_INFO.USER_NO = ? ORDER BY REV_NO DESC

INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW ( REV_NO , RES_NO , REV_TITLE , REV_CONTENT , REV_RATING , HOTEL_NO , USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ?
)

SELECT REV_NO , TB_REVIEW.RES_NO , TB_REVIEW.HOTEL_NO , REV_TITLE , REV_CONTENT , REV_RATING , DATE_IN , DATE_OUT , RES_PEOPLE , IMG_PATH , HOTEL_NAME FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = TB_REVIEW.HOTEL_NO LEFT JOIN TB_RES_INFO ON TB_RES_INFO.RES_NO = TB_REVIEW.RES_NO WHERE REV_NO = ? AND TB_REVIEW.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_REVIEW SET REV_TITLE = ? , REV_CONTENT = ? , REV_RATING = ? WHERE REV_NO = ?
SELECT RO_PRICE FROM TB_ROOM WHERE HOTEL_NO = ? AND RO_NO = ?
